alert.note: Alert for Berrien (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 1:25PM EST until February 01 at 7:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Michigan...Indiana... Saint Joseph River Michigan at South Bend affecting St. Joseph, Elkhart and Berrien Counties. Saint Joseph River Michigan at Three Rivers affecting St. Joseph MI, Elkhart and Branch Counties. .Recent snow melt, followed by heavy rain, has resulted in rising water on area rivers. For the Saint Joseph River Michigan...including Three Rivers, Mottville, Elkhart IN, South Bend, Niles...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saint Joseph River Michigan at South Bend. * WHEN...Until Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 5.5 feet, The river reaches flood stage with the lowest residential areas beginning to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 PM EST Sunday the stage was 5.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow evening to a crest of 5.6 feet early Tuesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 5.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 730 AM EST.
